PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The devices are structured as As shown in Figure 5a and Table 3 , the device that blended PQCDTB and PC61BM in a 1 : 1 ratio had an open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) of 0.76 V , a short - circuit current ( J SC ) of 4.4 mA cm^-2 , a fill factor ( FF ) of 47.5% and a power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) of 1.6% .

Let's think step by step.

1. "an open-circuit voltage (V\_{OC}) of 0.76 V" - Here, the property value is "0.76 V" which refers to the open-circuit voltage of the device.
2. "a short-circuit current (J\_{SC}) of 4.4 mA cm^-2" - Here, the property value is "4.4 mA cm^-2" which refers to the short-circuit current of the device.
3. "a fill factor (FF) of 47.5%" - Here, the property value is "47.5%" which refers to the fill factor of the device.
4. "a power conversion efficiency (PCE) of 1.6%" - Here, the property value is "1.6%" which refers to the power conversion efficiency of the device.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

* 0.76 V
* 4.4 mA cm^-2
* 47.5%
* 1.6%
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

* 0.76 V (open-circuit voltage)
* 4.4 mA cm^-2 (short-circuit current)
* 47.5% (fill factor)
* 1.6% (power conversion efficiency)

These are the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
